>> Also, you can only teach someone a language one point better than you know it. When they see the "your language skills have >> improved " stop coming, it is time for them to spamm you in that same language, keep going back and forth and soon you both >> will be excellent in the language.

A GM told me that he didn't think that this "learn one point better than you know it" was an intentional feature, but rather a bug, which would make utilizing it to gain excellent language skill an exploit. He did say he was not sure, though. Does anyone else out there have a line on this?
